attributes.action: Eradicate the unfairness by which the Pension Credit (meant to be a reward for saving) is reduced each time the State Pension rises!
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Dept to look again at the formula used to calculate Pension Credit so that one gets the full State Pension increase and not have it reduced by some notional amount according to a complicated formula. This means that at present any increase one gets in State Pension is then reduced in the Pension Credit.
